about.summary: 'SyncroSim' is a generalized framework for managing scenario-based datasets (<https://syncrosim.com/>). 'rsyncrosim' provides an interface to 'SyncroSim'. Simulation models can be added to 'SyncroSim' to transform these datasets, taking advantage of general features such as defining scenarios of model inputs, running Monte Carlo simulations, and summarizing model outputs. 'rsyncrosim' requires 'SyncroSim' 3.0.00 or higher (API documentation: <https://docs.syncrosim.com/>).

'SyncroSim' is a generalized framework for managing scenario-based datasets (<https://syncrosim.com/>). 'rsyncrosim' provides an interface to 'SyncroSim'. Simulation models can be added to 'SyncroSim' to transform these datasets, taking advantage of general features such as defining scenarios of model inputs, running Monte Carlo simulations, and summarizing model outputs. 'rsyncrosim' requires 'SyncroSim' 3.0.00 or higher (API documentation: <https://docs.syncrosim.com/>).

name: r-rsyncrosim
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.1.7" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set github = "https://github.com/syncrosim/rsyncrosim" %}

package:
  name: r-rsyncrosim
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ github }}/releases/download/{{ version }}/rsyncrosim_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ github }}/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4601aa3af56a465ba756b1112b6afafded52f83cf489abce0b7a4e30323accb7

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}git
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi
    - r-rsqlite
    - r-gtools
    - r-terra
    - r-processx
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi
    - r-rsqlite
    - r-gtools
    - r-terra
    - r-processx

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rsyncrosim')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rsyncrosim')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://syncrosim.github.io/rsyncrosim/
  dev_url: {{ github }}
  license: MIT
  summary: '''SyncroSim'' is a generalized framework for managing scenario-based datasets (<https://syncrosim.com/>). ''rsyncrosim'' provides an interface to ''SyncroSim''. Simulation models can be added to ''SyncroSim'' to transform these datasets, taking advantage of general features such as defining scenarios of model
    inputs, running Monte Carlo simulations, and summarizing model outputs. ''rsyncrosim'' requires ''SyncroSim'' 3.0.00 or higher (API documentation: <https://docs.syncrosim.com/>).'
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - katieb1
